name: Virtual Shopping Supermarket
description:
Do you want to play the game about the visit of the virtual shopping mall? Download this unique and entertaining story based happy family game. The game is all about having fun in the mall and buy some of the favorite things of the happy family members from different stores in the virtual mall.

Play this fun entertaining family simulator game now and get a chance to visit the beautiful shopping mall superstore. The happy kids will enjoy the shopping in the taxi cart.

The happy family is planning to go for some shopping! Play this fun filled simple game of the happy house family simulator.

All the happy family members are going to the virtual shopping mall to buy some of their favorite things. They have reached to the virtual shopping mall. The happy family needs to hire the taxi cart in the virtual shopping mall. Have fun and enjoy the ride. Complete the target to collect and buy different items from different stores within the time limit in the taxi cart.

The happy family is very excited for the shopping. Let all the happy family to ride the taxi cart and stop on to the targeted stores to buy the required things. Hurry up! There is a time limit for every task. Complete all the tasks and target within the time limit.

FEATURES :
Virtual shopping mall simulator
Time based game
Happy family to visit shopping mall
Different targets to complete
Engaging and simple on screen controls
Fun filled virtual game
Amazing 3D HD graphics
Addictive gameplay
Taxi cart feature to move around in the mall
